name: Mekafusion #2 BM02-BEAUTY
description:
Model: BM02-BEAUTY ( Base Mekanoid no.02 - BEAUTY )
Series: AMAZON

★ Properties
• Type: Base Mekanoid
• Skills: Intuition, Recovery
• Perks: Repair

A Base Mekanoid soldier model main component unit for Mekafusion AMAZON series. Designed for recovery and boost other Mekanoids, they are programmed to repair, intuitive suggestions, and flexible fighting skills. 

★ Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form ultimate machines.

Collect Mekanical robots in different series of factions in the Metaverse.



★★★★★
